question_stem: Suppose that x is a numpy array with shape (2,2) and y is a numpy array with shape (2,1). What is the name of the numpy function for adding column y as a new column to x (making it have shape (2,3))?
question_stem_html: Suppose that x is a numpy array with shape (2,2) and y is a numpy array with shape (2,1). What is the name of the numpy function for adding column y as a new column to x (making it have shape (2,3))?
